views.markdown:
Disables jailbreak detection in Google Tez

- if tez already detected your device as jailbroken, reinstall tez or reset it (using cacheclearer or by manually deleting app data)

- don't open tez with this tweak uninstalled/disabled or tez will detect jailbreak and you'll have to reset the app again

No options to configure.

No Screenshots for this item.
